alert.note: Alert for Chase; Custer; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued April 07 at 2:50PM CDT until April 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Perkins, Lincoln, Hayes, Keith, Garden, Chase, Deuel, Frontier and Custer Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Chase; Custer; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins
